title: Ears treatment wheat with application maps / agrirouter Data Exchange

tasks.task: Operating an arable farm in the Rheinland-Westphalia.
subtasks: Managing a family business, Sintsttterhof, located in Rommerskirchen.
Cultivating potatoes for French fries and chips.
Growing cereals, winter wheat, sugar beet, winter rape, and carrots.
Using Zavio for creating plant protection and fertilization tasks.
Selecting plant protection products and adjusting application rates based on crop density.
Utilizing satellite images to create application maps.
Transferring data via Agrarouter to the Amatron 4 terminal.
Monitoring and verifying application maps during field operations.
Updating as-applied maps in the office via Agrarouter.
Integrating technologies for efficient data transfer and management.
Overseeing student workers at the office.
Collaborating with field companies for data transfer support.
